content.text: I want to see all connected NODEs
So I can find out where a connection might be missing

status.description: Dieser Vorgang wird gerade durch den Bearbeiter bearbeitet.
status.name: In Arbeit

issuetype.description: Eine Sammlung ähnlicher Bugs, Stories und Tasks.
issuetype.name: Epic

content.text: I want to have a dedicated page for each IMAGE
So every information about it can be found in one place
an HTML page, displaying the specified image node
negative HTTP status code when the image does not exist (404)
the name of the image as a headline h1
the name of the image within the page title (might incl. other information like the node type or the more cars title)
a fact sheet section with all properties listed up
empty properties are marked as such
the image in a sensible size (not a thumbnail, not full size)
an appropriate message is shown when there exists no image with the given ID
Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version
NOT in scope for this iteration

status.description: Dieser Vorgang wird gerade durch den Bearbeiter bearbeitet.
status.name: In Arbeit

issuetype.description: Eine Sammlung ähnlicher Bugs, Stories und Tasks.
issuetype.name: Epic

content.text: I want to have a list of all IMAGEs (incl. some basic information)
So I can scroll through them to find interesting ones
an HTML page, displaying a list of all image nodes
n.a. → when there are no images an empty list is displayed → same status code (200)
all existing image nodes are displayed in list form:
each item contains the primary information for an image (name, creator, image_provider)
each item has a thumbnail image
each item links to the respective image detail page
an appropriate message is shown when there exist no nodes of that node type
Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version
NOT in scope for this iteration

content.text: On the CAR MODEL detail page
I want to see a link to the connected BRAND
So I can find other CAR MODELs they have created
the existing car model detail page is extended to display a prominent section for the connected brand
a headline h2 describing the relationship
the section is not shown when there is no brand attached to the car model
Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version

content.text: On the CAR MODEL detail page
I want to see a gallery of all attached IMAGEs
So I can get a visual impression of the car from different angles
the existing car model detail page is extended to display a prominent section for the connected images
a headline h2 describing the relationship
a list of all image that are attached to the car model (in small resolution)
linked to the resp. image detail pages
a number with the amount of connected images
the section is not shown when there are no images attached to the car model
Local copy of the API spec is updated to a matching version

content.text: I want to have a list of all CAR MODELs (incl. some basic information)
So I can scroll through them to find interesting ones (e.g. strange name, very old, built for a very long time)
an HTML page, displaying a list of all car model nodes
n.a. → when there are no car models an empty list is displayed → same status code (200)
all existing car model nodes are displayed in list form:
each item contains the primary information for a car model (name, built_from, built_to, internal_code)
each item links to the respective car model detail page
an appropriate message is shown when there exist no nodes of that node type
